answers.answer: Hi Lynn,This forum is for questions about diabetes. It is not an appropriate place to sell medical equipment. Please keep posts to questions and answers.ThanksCathy

question: I am selling a gently used charcoal Medtronic paradigm REAL-Time 522 Insulin Pump, which works perfectly and looks like brand new.  It comes with the box and all the original supplies.  It takes one AAA battery, included.  It can be used with Medtronic Continuous Glucose Monitoring (not included).  The pump originally sold for $6,000.  Asking $950.00.  Email me for pictures.Also selling 12 boxes of Medtronic MMT-326A, Reservoirs with expiration dates in 2015 and 2016, for $24.00 each.
title: Medtronic Paradigm REAL-Time 522 insulin pump
